warn_tests.test:
import fluidity_tools
field = fortran90_vtu.GetScalarField("DifferenceFortran90")
print "Difference", field.min(), field.max() fluidity_tools.compare_variable(field.min(), 0.0, 1.0e-12) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(field.max(), 0.0, 1.0e-12)
